meanings.definition: Drugs used to treat high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed antihypertensives to help with my high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Many people take antihypertensives to manage their hypertension.
meanings.sent3: I guess I'll have to start calling my pills 'antihypertensives' instead of 'magic beans'!
meanings.sent4: The effect of antihypertensives on blood pressure is like a gentle breeze calming a storm.
meanings.sent5: The word 'antihypertensives' sounds like a superhero for high blood pressure.
